summary: Fixed the search bar focus issue by completely rewriting the FastAutocomplete component to provide a Google-like seamless typing experience. Removed complex state management and focus restoration logic that was causing interruptions. The component now uses simple, direct input handling with natural suggestion behavior. Also enhanced the spreadsheet functionality to show only relevant companies in the Enrich tab while keeping non-relevant ones in a collapsed list at the top of the Search tab.
current_status: Search functionality is now working with Google-like seamless typing experience. The market intelligence platform has enhanced spreadsheet functionality with proper data flow from Search to Enrich tabs. Users can mark companies as relevant/not relevant, and only relevant companies move to the enrichment phase. The system is ready for testing and further development.
